amendment.description: Amendment prevents the Department of Justice from using federal funds for litigation that undermines the Affordable Care Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 89 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prevent the Department of Justice from using federal funds for litigation that undermines the Affordable Care Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Underwood amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 194 (Roll no. 374).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Underwood amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 194 (Roll no. 374).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A038) offered by Ms. Underwood.
